SearchCarrierActHistory.MainSQL:
SELECT DURABLE_ID , GR_CSTID , TRANSACTION_CODE , TRANSACTION_DATE , DURABLE_STATUS_CODE , EQUIPMENT_ID , CST_CLEAN_FLAG , TRF_STAT_CODE , CST_LOAD_LOCATION_CODE , PORT_ID , RACK_ID , USE_FLAG FROM TB_EGN_DURB_HIST WHERE 1=1 +Option1 +Option2
AND TRANSACTION_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(@StartTime,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(@EndTime,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ORDER BY TRANSACTION_DATE DESC
